notes: invariable noun; same form in plural

example_sentence_italian: Non capisco i perché della decisione.
example_sentence_english: I do not understand the reasons for the decision.
We talk about the reason for the change.
I get to the reason right away.
I start from the reason for the choice.
I go into the reason for the problem.
I read an article about the reason.
I get to the reasons later.
I start from the main reasons.
I go into the reasons of the issue.
We discuss the reasons for the crisis.
I agree with the reasons presented.
